manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Looking for a mini desk lamp that packs a punch? Look no further! This small desk lamp is perfect for those who want a powerful and efficient lighting solution without sacrificing style. It is available in different sizes, including a tall desk lamp for those who need a little more height. This lamp is not just for adults - kids will love it too! The cute desk lamp is a great addition to any child's study table, providing a comfortable and well-lit space for them to do their homework or read their favorite book.

SOLID GREEN GLASS BANKERS LAMP This green desk lamp is perfect for use in any home office or professional workspace, and its vintage-inspired design makes it an ideal choice for those who appreciate classic aesthetics. The lamp is also a great option for libraries or reading rooms, where it can be used to create a cozy ambiance.

USES STANDARD MEDIUM BASE BULBS Use a standard E26 medium-base bulb. We recommend using 8 watts LED Tube Bulb shown Below. Medium Base E26 Max 40 Watt 110 Volts USA Standard Pull Chain On/Off Switch THE ORIGINAL BANKERS LAMP The Bankers Standard The rectangular green glass shade is the focal point of this banker’s lamp, adding a pop of color to the design while also providing ample illumination for reading, writing, or working. The shade's shape is specifically designed to direct the light downwards, ensuring that your workspace is evenly lit and free from harsh glare. Solid Thick Green Glass Shade with White Opal Inner Coating Polished Brass Plated Finish Pull Chain On/Off Switch Uses Standard Medium Base Bulbs Bankers Lamp Measures: 15" H x 10.25" W x 6.4" D

THE ORIGINAL SOLID GREEN GLASS BANKERS LAMP WITH POLISHED BRASS FINISH. Illuminate your workspace with the perfect blend of vintage charm and modern functionality with this exquisite banker's lamp. Say hello to the Banker's Desk Lamp with Green Glass Shade and Brass Finish - a versatile and durable desk lamp that effortlessly blends traditional and contemporary design elements. Crafted with a sturdy metal frame, this lamp is built to last and will stand the test of time. Its sleek brass finish adds a touch of sophistication to your office desk while the small round base provides a stable foundation to support the lamp's weight.

THE ORIGINAL GREEN GLASS BANKERS LAMP SOLID GREEN GLASS SHADE Measuring 15 inches tall and 10.25 inches wide, this desk lamp has a timeless design that instantly adds a touch of traditional style to any interior space. POLISHED BRASS FINISH Hand Polished Brass Plated Metal Frame. This lamp is made from solid steel that has been electroplated with brass and hand polished into a mirror-like reflection finish. ON/OFF PULL CHAIN Detailed with a classic pull chain that turns the lamp on and off, this banker’s lamp is a fashionable and functional addition to any desk. USES STANDARD MEDIUM BASE BULBS This banker’s lamp is designed for use with a 40 watt incandescent bulb or the LED BULB equivalent. The shade is adjustable to offer different lighting directions, making it perfect for positioning in the center of a desk or in the corner of a table.

If you're a fan of vintage décor, this lamp is a must-have. The vintage banker's desk lamp design adds a touch of classic elegance to any workspace. The green glass shade bankers lamp is a classic and timeless choice that will never go out of style. Plus, the adjustable banker's lamp feature makes it practical and functional for everyday use. So whether you're looking for a black desk lamp, a green desk lamp, or a modern desk lamp, the Banker's Desk Lamp with Green Glass Shade and Brass Finish is the perfect choice for anyone who wants to add style, sophistication, and functionality to their workspace. Order yours today and light up your life!

The green glass shade of this lamp exudes a warm and inviting glow that is perfect for creating a relaxing and conducive atmosphere for work. Whether you're typing up a storm on your computer or reading a book, this desk lamp will provide the right amount of illumination for your needs. But wait, there's more! This banker's lamp is not only elegant, but it is also highly functional. It features a dimmable LED bulb that allows you to adjust the brightness level to your liking. Plus, it is adjustable, so you can easily direct the light exactly where you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was worried it would be cheap but it is actually very nice and made very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk lamp for the price
reviews.reviewText: My old "goose neck" desk lamp finally gave up the ghost and I needed a simple replacement for it. What I found out in my search for a new one is that many desk lamps sold at lighting shops, and even at home improvement stores are way, way overpriced for what they are. The Banker's Lamp I purchased on Amazon.com was just what I needed.The green shade, as some have pointed out, may be lighter in hue than traditional banker's lamp shades. But because I have never owned one before, the shade of green seemed just fine to me and didn't appear to be light at all. The unit is solidly built, and it only took a few minutes to assemble the unit. I like the way the pull chain works--it feels solid and will be able to take a lot of heavy use. Some have reported that the chain sometimes gets stuck and cannot be pulled down. This problem seems to be intermittent and can easily be fixed by just pushing the chain gently back into the hole to "reset" it. Add a drop of oil and the problem is solved.I used a 15 watt CFL bulb in this lamp and it works great. You can rotate the shade to direct the light's intensity away or towards you.Overall, for under $20, at the time of this writing, this is an excellent desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift. She loves it. Said it was very nice looking and works well. She was pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The product is sturdy, and I like the soft light it gives ...
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my husband to use over his piano to read his sheet music. The product is sturdy, and I like the soft light it gives to the rest of the room while it's on, but at the same time, shining a bright light directly down onto the surface it rests on, illuminating your desk for easy reading. If you buy the lamp as a desk lamp, it's intended purpose, it's absolutely perfect; however, there are a few very slight drawbacks if you're using it for a piano light, which is why I purchased this. So the cons are: 1. The farther away you place the lamp from the surface you are focusing on, the less intense the light is, making it less effective for illuminating what's below it. 2. Expanding on my first point, another negative is that the base of this lamp is large. While the large circumference of the base makes it sturdy, it does tend to block some light from going past the base. So if you're not planning to use it as a desk lamp, it may be a problem. 3. Again, it has a large base making it not as "shelf friendly" as I'd like. 4. The lamp shade only comes in green.So to elaborate, I have an electronic keyboard which rests against a wall. Above the keyboard I had mounted a shelf, and put an old lamp I had laying around the house on the shelf. This way, I can turn the lamp on while playing so that it would illuminate my sheet music. I decided to buy this banker's lamp to replace my old lamp. The small issues I'm having are that the base of the banker's lamp is large and doesn't really set well on the shelf. It overhangs the shelf, so I will probably have to get a wider shelf. On the other hand, the large base makes for a sturdy lamp; additionally, once the lamp is on the shelf, the intensity of light diminishes, and the base of the lamp also blocks some additional light. It seems as though maybe lowering the placement of my shelf and tilting the green lamp shade out a little bit should increase the intensity of light enough for me to read my sheet music. It is a sturdy, well-made product. I do wish the glass shade came in other colors. I saw some other lamps with different shades, but upon reading the descriptions of those I discovered the shades were made of plastic and the rest of the lamp was made of cheaper materials. I ultimately chose this one because of the quality, and I am glad I did. All in all its a good, quality lamp. After a few adjustments, it should work great for my piano.
